item.description:
Come with us for a hike and picnic lunch today!  We'll meet at Ipswich River Wildlife Sanctuary:

http://www.massaudubon.org/Nature_Connection/Sanctuaries/Ipswich_River/index.php

For the first time in a while, we will enjoy a picnic on the trail, so pack along a huge picnic lunch and beverages to enjoy!  The combined hike and picnic will last about 3 - 3 1/2 hours, although may go a bit over.  In order for this to be a relaxing hike - and to enjoy the picnic - best to block off at least 4 hours of time, from 9:30 - 1:30.

Bring along bird seeds to feed our feathered friends who will eat right from your hand  -really neat!  Footwear with solid grips for muddy rocks or pebbles is recommended, along with a hiking pole if you have one.

Please note that the Sanctuary does charge a $4.00 entrance fee for non-members.  Also, they don't allow dogs (or cats - lol!) due to all the birds and wildlife.

Hope you can come! Don't forget the bug spray!

Randy
item.how_to_find_us: Look for silver Subaru Forester in the back of the parking lot behind the red building.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Hike and Picnic in the Woods of Topsfield!
